column4: would it be possible to make a script and add it to nautilus to right click a file and upload it to a ftp site automagically
after i copy the scripts in their anything i need to do?
sudo mount -o loop -t iso9660 d3.bin /media/iso doesn't work for some reason
google turned up a lot of hits, I don't know how to do it myself
i have it on my breezy machine also
i'm done with this debate thanks.
packages.ubuntu.com has the package mdf2iso only on dapper.  Maybe it has a different name?
